name: Create a Brand Strategy with ChatGPT and Google Docs
description:
Effortlessly create a comprehensive brand strategy using ChatGPTâ€™s AI insights, organized and documented through Google Docs. This template helps you maintain consistency and thoroughness in your strategic planning.

Estimated number of ChatGPT tokens used by this template: 4,000 tokens for prompts and 1,000 tokens for a completion.
